OrgName: LKN Communications, Inc. dba ACN, Inc.
activities: ACN markets telecommunications and energy services.  Certain customer data is transmitted to the US for purposes of reporting information to our independent representatives in North America and Europe and for the purposes of calculating commissions and bonuses.
